title: Ticket #6793: pslot preemption bug could preempt some dslots in error
description: A bug in Matchmaker::pslotMultiMatch() can result in preemption of dslots unnecessarily when ALLOW_PSLOT_PREEMPTION=True.
remarks:
2018-Oct-15 14:43:35 by tlmiller:
JaimeF also agrees that the code in question looks buggy. Since GregT is in China for the next two weeks, I've started work on the obvious patch and will ask the customer to test it.

2018-Oct-15 15:07:19 by tlmiller:
Assuming the BaTLab tests pass, it seems like the following should work. 

commit 7a10cd53fdc1597245ff5f19b20dedc661523135
Author: Todd L Miller <tlmiller@cs.wisc.edu>
Date:   Mon Oct 15 15:00:13 2018 -0500

    (#6793)  See if the naive fix works.

diff --git a/src/condor_negotiator.V6/matchmaker.cpp b/src/condor_negotiator.V6/
matchmaker.cpp

@@ -6953,6 +6953,7 @@ Matchmaker::pslotMultiMatch(ClassAd *job, ClassAd *machine, double preemptPrio,

                // In rank order, see if by preempting one more dslot would cause pslot to match

        for (unsigned int slot = 0; slot < ranks.size() && ranks[slot].second <= newRank; slot++) {
                int dSlot = ranks[slot].first; // dslot index in childXXX list

                                continue;
                        }

-                       // Finally, if we made it here, this slot is a candidate for preemption,
-                       // fall through and try to merge its resources into the pslot to match
-                       // and preempt this one.
-
+                       // Finally, if we made it here, this slot is a candidate for
+                       // preemption, fall through and try to merge its resources into

                        dslot_claims.clear();

+                               int child = *i;
                                dslot_claims += child_claims[ranks[child].first];
                                dslot_claims += " ";
                                // TODO Move this clearing of claim ids to

2018-Oct-17 16:28:21 by tlmiller:
Sent the Windows 10 build from run ID 451957 to the user for testing.

2018-Oct-17 16:53:58 by jfrey:
I have tested this patch and it works properly. There is one change that's needed. In the dprintf("Matched pslot by rank preempting %d dynamic slots\n") message, the final argument should be changed to (int)usableDSlots.size().

2018-Oct-17 17:24:21 by tlmiller:
Change made. Patch approved by TJ for 8.6.13; hopefully we'll get good new from the user, too.

2018-Oct-18 11:13:55 by jfrey:
One more change is required. The usableDSlots.push_back(slot); statement needs to be moved below the following closing brace. It needs to happen regardless of the relative ranks of candidate job and currently-running job.

2018-Oct-18 11:49:12 by tlmiller:
I'm not adding documentation for the second patch, as the code was never released and the description of the fix didn't change.
